`IgnRonn2Man` is getting included in [`ign_create_docs`](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/src/467f2033527eda5f13a42aff4a37a2caa2bf4afb/cmake/IgnCreateDocs.cmake?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#IgnCreateDocs.cmake-47), but `ign_create_docs` is currently being called after the build directories are configured, because the documentation template `api.in` contains the variable `ign_doxygen_component_input_dirs` which is easiest to set while searching for component source directories.

I expect this can be fixed by moving the `include(IgnRonn2Man)` call out of `ign_create_docs()` and putting it closer to the top of `ign_configure_build()`.

Is there a good project/branch for me to test the fix against?
